ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue is:
Are the mandatory sentences imposed upon petitioner illegal pursuant to Alleyne v. United States[, — U.S. —, 133 S.Ct. 2151, 186 L.Ed.2d 314 (2013) ]?
